name: Granpa's Mansion
description:
Even before I was born, my grandfather died of illness. In October of the year I turned 17, my grandmother delivered a letter that my grandfather left me.

dear my grandson

By the time you read this letter, you must be 17 already.
Even as I write this letter, I want to see you, who has grown up well.
I want to give you a gift that your grandfather has never had in your life.
you will be embarrassed to say that it's a gift from your grandfather you've never seen in your life, but I hope you find it
I hope you don't think it's homework

P.s The back of the letter is a map.

ㅡ The grandfather who still misses you

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

내가 태어나기도전 할아버지는 병으로 돌아가셨다. 
내가 17살이 된해 10월달 할머니는 할아버지가 
나에게 남기신 편지를 전달해주셨다.

친애하는 손자에게 

니가 이편지를 읽을때면 벌써 17살 이겠구나. 
이 편지를 쓰고 있는 지금도 잘 성장한 너가 보고 싶구나 
자랑스럽게 자랄 너에게 할아버지도 평생 가지지못한 선물을 주고 싶다. 
평생 얼굴 한 번 보지못한 할아버지의 선물이라니 
당혹스럽겠지만 꼭 너가 찾아 주었으면 한다 
숙제라고 생각하지 않았으면 좋겠구나 

P.s 편지뒷면은 지도란다 

ㅡ 아직도 너를 그리워 하는 할아버지가 

Developer E-mail address: hcg100087@gmail.com
